Title: Xaml Cop
Description:
Xaml Cop
- Check bindings in XAML of C# or VB project
Using Binding finder as base (http://robrelyea.com/demos/BindingFinder/)

Planned extensions:
- Categorise binding warnings and errors
- Check FxCop rules using XAML Toolkit
- Create Visual Studio Extension for Xaml Cop
HomeWiki:
NOTE: Project discontinued

Project Description
Xaml Cop
- Check bindings in XAML of C# or VB project
Using Binding finder as base (http://robrelyea.com/demos/BindingFinder/)
